body_html: After I mowed away some DeviceGuard calls, DeviceGuard overhead isn't noticeable anymore in the models I benchmarked (#13974), but I think this would be nice to prevent a situation in the future where we have a native function call DeviceGuard 5 times again instead of 0-1.
body_text: After I mowed away some DeviceGuard calls, DeviceGuard overhead isn't noticeable anymore in the models I benchmarked (#13974), but I think this would be nice to prevent a situation in the future where we have a native function call DeviceGuard 5 times again instead of 0-1.
body: After I mowed away some DeviceGuard calls, DeviceGuard overhead isn't noticeable anymore in the models I benchmarked (#13974), but I think this would be nice to prevent a situation in the future where we have a native function call DeviceGuard 5 times again instead of 0-1.
